content: alex s baby blanket updated march 14 2012 the blanket consists of moss stitch edges and a tulip lace body following the instructions below casting 97 stitches will give you a blanket that is about ~29 cid 0 wide this was made to be a small carriage blanket add repeats see below if you want to make yours longer note this was my very first pattern written so it was simple notes that i could follow i ve now updated it to help some of those that have gotten confused in the past you will need us 7 - 4 5mm circular needles 36 long 1 ball of pound of love or equivalent yarn i had more than half of the ball left over so for this small blanket i used less than 500 yards cast on 97 stitches or multiple of 8 plus 17 - as i mentioned above 97 stitches gave me ~29 width odd row rs are the tulip lace pattern it appears in bold text moss stitch edge of the blanket appears in red/regular text abbreviations yf yarn forward skp slip one stitch knit one pass the slipped stitch over k2tog knit two together in chart appears as as /\ row 1 to 8 k1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end row 9 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 knit until 5 stitches left k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 10 & even row k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 purl until 5 stitches left k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 11 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 k3 *yf skp k6 repeat from * to last 9 stiches yf skp k2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 13 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 k1 *k2tog yf k1 yf skp k3 repeat from * to last 11 sts k2tog yf k1 yf skp k1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 15 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 same as row 11 row 17 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 knit to last 5 stitches k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 19 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 k7 *yf skp k6 repeat from* to last 5 stitches k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 21 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 k5 *k2tog yf k1 yf skp k3 repeat from * to last 7 stitches k2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 23 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 same as row 19 row 24 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 purl until last 5 stitches left k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 repeat row 9 to 24 until you get desired lenght i chose to repeat until blanket was about 34 inches in length last 8 row same as first 8 row moss stitch k1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end bind off pattern created by angie jaszek www squirrelsgolikethis com alex s baby blanket for those that are visual learners like i am here is a small swatch for this blanket | -
